item.title: Everything that uses configuration files should report where they're located
item.description: - Configuration files should clearly indicate their location in order to help system administrators manage various programs effectively.

item.title: Show HN: Open-source resume builder & parser
item.description: - OpenResumeBuilderParser is a free and open-source resume builder and parser tool.

item.title: The 'fuck you' pattern
item.description: - The post discusses the concept of 'dark patterns' in the software industry, which are intentional designs that manipulate users into certain actions.

item.title: Ignoring boys' emotional needs fuels public health risks
item.description: - Ignoring boys' deeper emotional needs in the name of early independence can lead to public health risks later in life.

item.title: XML is the future
item.description: - XML was once hailed as the future of programming but turned out to mostly be technical debt.

item.title: Tintin, Hergé & Chang
item.description: - The Tintin comics by Hergé became famous for their geographical and historical accuracy because of the friendship between Hergé and Chang Chong-Ren.

item.title: Towards a "PCB Drone" – Making a PCB Motor which reaches 30k RPM [video]
item.description: - A video showcasing a "PCB Drone" has been released, demonstrating a motor capable of reaching 30,000 revolutions per minute (RPM).

item.title: Show HN: WinGPT – AI assistant for Windows 3.1
item.description: - WinGPT is an AI assistant designed specifically for Windows 3.1, offering features like research, entertainment, and productivity support.

item.title: Zotero Better Notes – Knowledge management inside Zotero
item.description: - Better Notes is a plugin for Zotero, a platform for managing and organizing research and knowledge.

item.title: Eight-mile frieze of Ice Age beasts found in Amazon rainforest (2020)
item.description: - Researchers have discovered thousands of rock art pictures in the Amazon rainforest that depict Ice Age creatures such as mastodons and giant sloths.
